basics.name: Zeshan Basaran
basics.title: Data Analyst / Software Engineer
basics.tagline: I analyze data, engineer software, and build intelligent systems.

details: Provided high-quality service to elite guests, such as US senators and political candidates.
Consistently received 5 star reviews and averaged over 20% on tips.
Provided attentive customer service in a high-volume environment, resolving inquiries and ensuring a positive guest experience.
Simultaneously managed multiple orders and transactions with accuracy and efficiency under time-sensitive conditions.
Collaborated across departments to coordinate service, demonstrating strong teamwork and communication skills.
Assisted a week-long coding workshop for middle and high schoolers.
Provided one-on-one guidance and supported the participants as they worked through coding exercises and projects, leading to a 100% completion rate for all 30 coding exercises.
Acted as a mentor and role model for 30 aspiring programmers by fostering a positive and inclusive learning environment.
Handled high-volume inbound phone orders daily, accurately entering details and confirming information with customers.
Managed 100+ takeout transactions per week with 99% accuracy, ensuring timely preparation and delivery.
Organized and maintained inventory of supplies, supporting efficient daily operations.
Trained and mentored 15+ new employees on order systems, compliance, and customer service best practices.

achievements: Director of Fundraising (2024-5), National Student Data Corp
Finalist (2024) & 2nd Place Winner (2025), Towson Data Analytics Competition

projects.name: Translator: Morse ↔ Binary ↔ English
projects.description: Java project using abstract classes and polymorphism to translate between multiple code systems.

projects.name: Movie Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Python NLP project analyzing IMDB reviews using scikit-learn classifiers.

projects.name: Sensor Data Analysis
projects.description: Python program analyzing glutamate sensor data for the Allen Institute.

projects.name: Systematic Trading Backtester
projects.description: Python engine for backtesting SMA/Bollinger strategies with SQLite/MySQL/Postgres integration.

certifications.title: Data Analytics Competition (TU)
certifications.details: Presented 10-minute analysis on DAP marketing data.

timeline.event: Enrolled at Towson University, Computer Science major.
Internship at City of Baltimore, Incident/Problem Management.
Mentored at Carroll County Public Library coding workshop.
Graduated Towson University, B.S. Computer Science.
